queries.question: How can I reset my password?
queries.response: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions to reset your password.

queries.question: What are the payment options available?
queries.response: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. You can select your preferred payment method at checkout.

queries.question: How do I track my order?
queries.response: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Order History' section.

queries.question: Can I cancel my order?
queries.response: Yes, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. Go to 'Order History' and select the order you wish to cancel.

queries.question: What is the return policy?
queries.response: Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days of receipt. Please ensure the items are in their original condition.

queries.question: What are your operating hours?
queries.response: We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.

queries.question: How can I contact customer support?
queries.response: You can contact our customer support via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-555-0199.

queries.question: Do you offer international shipping?
queries.response: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Please check our shipping policy for more details.

queries.question: How do I update my account information?
queries.response: To update your account information, log in to your account and go to the 'Settings' section.

queries.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
queries.response: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our customer support immediately with your order details and a photo of the damaged item.

queries.question: What items are available in your store?
queries.response: We offer a variety of items including printing services, stationery, college files, and more. Please visit our store page for a complete list.

queries.question: What is the price for color printing?
queries.response: Color printing costs 5 rupees per page. Discounts are available for bulk orders.

queries.question: What is the price for black and white printing?
queries.response: Black and white printing costs 2 rupees per page. Discounts are available for bulk orders.

queries.question: What stationery items do you offer?
queries.response: We offer a range of stationery items including pens, notebooks, binders, and more. Check our stationery section for details.

queries.question: How much do college files cost?
queries.response: College files are priced at 20 rupees each. We offer various types and sizes to suit your needs.

queries.question: What is this platform designed for?
queries.response: This platform automates and digitizes common campus services like printing requests and stationary purchases to reduce manual effort and improve user convenience.

queries.question: Who can use this platform?
queries.response: Students, faculty, and service providers on campus can use this platform.

queries.question: Is the platform accessible via both web and mobile?
queries.response: Yes, it is designed for both web and mobile accessibility.

queries.question: What are the operating hours of the service?
queries.response: The platform operates 24/7, but specific services like printing and stationary pickup may have designated hours.

queries.question: How do I upload a document for printing?
queries.response: Students can upload documents through the web or mobile app and queue their printing jobs.

queries.question: How can I track the status of my printing request?
queries.response: The platform provides real-time tracking of printing requests in the user dashboard.

queries.question: What types of files are supported for printing?
queries.response: Common formats like PDF, DOCX, PPT, and PNG are supported.

queries.question: Can I specify print settings (color, grayscale, duplex, etc.)?
queries.response: Yes, users can customize print settings before submitting their request.

queries.question: Where do I collect my printed documents?
queries.response: You will receive a notification specifying the pickup location.

queries.question: Can I purchase stationary items through the platform?
queries.response: Yes, users can browse and order stationary items through the platform.

queries.question: How do I know if a stationary item is in stock?
queries.response: The platform provides real-time inventory updates for stationary items.

queries.question: Where do I collect my stationary order?
queries.response: Pickup details will be provided upon order confirmation.

queries.question: Can I return or exchange a stationary item?
queries.response: Returns and exchanges depend on the specific policies of the stationary store.

queries.question: Can I schedule a printing request for a later time?
queries.response: Yes, users can schedule printing jobs in advance.

queries.question: How long does it take to process a print request?
queries.response: Processing times depend on the queue, but estimated times are shown on the dashboard.

queries.question: Can I reserve stationary items in advance?
queries.response: Yes, users can reserve items and pick them up later.
